plot¶

rescomp.measures.plot(reservoir, flag='y', save_switch=False, path='')¶

Shows timeresolved plots of: ‘r’: some of the reservoir states ‘y’: the predicted and true future states ‘t’: the x,y plot of the trajectory

nrmse_over_time

Next topic

rmse
